Sentencas: Within the context of sustainable energy supply and CO2 emissions reduction a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) - gas turbine hybrid system, fuelled with gasified woody biomass is studied in detail for small and medium scale applications (100 kW(th,BM) and 8 MWth,BM of dry biomass input).
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: The system consists of an air dryer unit, a gasifier, a hot cleaning section made of a particulate removal unit (cyclone and candle filter) and a two-stage tar removal unit, a SOFC and a gas turbine with optional CO2 capture.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: This modern technology has the advantage of using a renewable and CO2-neutral source and to be economically competitive at medium scales.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: The competitiveness of different process options is systematically compared by applying a coherent approach combining flowsheeting, energy integration and economic evaluation in a multi-objective optimization framework.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: This analysis reveals the importance of process integration maximizing the heat recovery and valorizing the waste heat, by cogeneration for example.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: The studied process options include direct and indirect circulating fluidized bed gasifier (using respectively oxygen or steam as gasification agent) and Viking gasifier, atmospheric or pressurized systems and optional pre-reforming in the hot gas cleaning.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: To close the thermal energy balance, a fraction of the produced syngas can be burnt.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: The energy integration results reveal that the steam production for the gasification and reforming are key parameters (S/B and S/C ratio) defining the process performance.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: A multi-objective optimization maximizing the efficiency and minimizing the capital investment costs is performed with respect to the operating conditions and the process configuration in order to assess the trade-offs and identify optimal process designs.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass

Sentencas: The analysis shows the potential of the system converting woody biomass into electricity with an energy efficiency greater than 70%.
Titulo: Thermo-economic optimization of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell - Gas turbine system fuelled with gasified lignocellulosic biomass
